name: Pokemon Chess - Dark & Electric Types - Chess.com
description: A chess style that keeps the simplicity and symbolism of chess iconography while mixing in twelve pokemon from two types that represent light and dark.
additional_info:
WHITE PIECES
-----------------------
Pawn - Magnemite, the Magnet Pokemon
Bishop - Emolga, the Sky Squirrel Pokemon
Knight - Jolteon, the Lightning Pokemon
Rook - Heliolisk, the Generator Pokemon
Queen - Rotom, the Plasma Pokemon
King - Magnezone, the Magnet Area Pokemon

BLACK PIECES
-----------------------
Pawn - Pawniard, the Sharp Blade Pokemon
Bishop - Murkrow, the Darkness Pokemon
Knight - Umbreon, the Moonlight Pokemon
Rook - Obstagoon, the Blocking Pokemon
Queen - Sableye, the Darkness Pokemon
King - Kingambit, the Big Blade Pokemon
